word_mean: 流行性腮腺炎：一种由副粘液病毒引起的急性传染病，可通过直接接触、空气飞沫、传染性唾液污染的物件而传播，还可通过尿液传播
虽可累及成人，但通常多见于15岁以下儿童，多数病例为亚临床的
临床症状显著者有腮腺炎—一侧或两侧腮腺肿胀、疼痛，其他唾液腺亦可被累及
累及其他器官时可致多种合并症，主要有男性睾丸附睾炎，女性卵巢炎，脑膜脑炎以及胰腺炎
两颊下半部肿胀的表现。
以发热、耳下腮部漫肿疼痛为主要表现的疾病。

sentence.Network_cn: 腮腺炎是一种儿童疾病.

sentence.Network_en: Measles, mumps and whooping cough are spreading again because children are not being vaccinated.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为孩子们没接种疫苗，麻疹、腮腺炎和百日咳又蔓延开来。

病毒性脑膜炎也称为无菌性脑膜炎-症状比细菌性的轻微.正常程序约1至2周之后自然痊愈.以肠病毒最常见.其他如腮腺(mumps).庖疹.
mummy 木乃伊mumps 列性腮腺炎mural 壁的

list.abs: 医学博士英语(转载)_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... mesosome 中介体 mumps virus 腮腺炎病毒 mycosis 真菌病.
种: Mumps virus 流行性腮腺炎病毒,或称腮腺炎病毒,是指引起腮腺、舌下腺、颚下腺肿大、头痛、发烧,能引起多种并发症,男性还易引起睾丸肿胀。 现存的野生型种为.
Measles mumps and rubella What are the symptoms ?, 麻疹腮腺炎和风疹有什么症状?
mummy 妈咪mump 闹情绪mumpish 愠怒的
助记：妈妈不开心（Mump），不要去碰她（Bump），哥哥大傻瓜（Gump），长个大肿块（Lump），漂亮才丰满（Plump），死了 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from obsolete mump 'grimace, have a miserable expression'

entry.def: Mumps is a disease usually caught by children. It causes a mild fever and painful swelling of the glands in the neck.

means.word_mean: 1. an acute contagious viral disease characterized by fever and by swelling of the parotid glands

auth_sentence.content: Mumps is a viral infection of the parotid glands.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mumps is a viral infection of the parotid glands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mumps is a viral infection of the parotid glands.

auth_sentence.content: Most children recover from mumps with no long-lasting problems.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most children recover from mumps with no long-lasting problems.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most children recover from mumps with no long-lasting problems.

auth_sentence.content: Measles- and mumps-containing vaccines are live attenuated virus vaccines.
auth_sentence.res_content: Measles- and mumps-containing vaccines are live attenuated virus vaccines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Measles- and mumps-containing vaccines are live attenuated virus vaccines.
